Which bank has your company partnered wi: We have partnered with the Indian Bank for our CC services & it's the india's first gold backed credit card.
How many days i'll get for repayment?: You'll get a 20 days duration for repayment.
What's the interest rate for late bill p: You'll be charged 12%pm as a late fee.
What all offers will be there for new cu: You'll get flat 10% cashback for the first month,post that 5% cashback. Your annual charges will be free if your spent is above 6 lakhs.
